on reading compounds: 序【ジョ】order, ordering, beginning, start, foreword, preface, introduction, opening of a song (in gagaku or noh)
序盤【ジョバン】the opening(s) (e.g. in a game of go or chess)
公序【コウジョ】public order, public policy
西序【セイジョ】memorial rite involving the western sanctum
kun reading compounds: 序でに【ついでに】incidentally, taking the opportunity, while (you) are at it, on the occasion
序でに【ついでに】incidentally, taking the opportunity, while (you) are at it, on the occasion
